name: Udit Goenka
position: Raising Pre-Seed Round (Send me a DM to learn more). LinkedIn Top Voice. Angel Investor. TedX Speaker. LinkedIn CAP India 2022. Featured by LinkedIn India. Building India's first AI-first SaaS Venture Studio.

experience.title: Founder & CEO
experience.description: TinyCheque is India's first AI-powered SaaS Venture Studio. We accelerate existing SaaS startups, IT services, and individual experts by building and scaling profitable AI-enabled vertical micro SaaS solutions.My CEO Responsibilities:- Drive product-led growth through strategic design and user-centric vision.- Forge partnerships and joint ventures to expand market reach and capabilities.- Actively manage the sales pipeline, ensuring robust conversion strategies.- Cultivate a lean, high-performance team focused on profitability from inception.- Proactively identify new market gaps to fuel continuous innovation.To connect for partnerships, send me an email at udit@tinycheque.comP.S. We have recently raised pre-seed capital.
